mapper.select: SELECT mno, title, alno, ano, poster, genre, altitle, urlmp4, aname, num FROM (SELECT mno, title, alno, ano, poster, genre, altitle,urlmp4, aname, rownum as num FROM (SELECT mno, title, alno, ano, poster, genre, urlmp4 ,(SELECT atitle FROM album WHERE album.alno=music.alno) as altitle, (SELECT aname FROM artist where artist.ano=music.ano) as aname FROM music WHERE genre LIKE '%'||#{genre}||'%' ORDER BY playcount DESC) WHERE aname LIKE '%'||#{ss}||'%' OR title LIKE '%'||#{ss}||'%') WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT mno, title, alno, ano, poster, genre, altitle, urlmp4, aname, num FROM (SELECT mno, title, alno, ano, poster, genre, altitle, urlmp4, aname, rownum as num FROM (SELECT mno, title, alno, ano, poster, genre, (SELECT atitle FROM album WHERE album.alno=music.alno) as altitle, urlmp4, (SELECT aname FROM artist where artist.ano=music.ano) as aname FROM music WHERE titlecheck=1 ORDER BY mno DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/50.0) FROM music WHERE genre LIKE '%'||#{genre}||'%'

SELECT alno, ano, atitle, poster, aname, num FROM (SELECT alno, ano, atitle, poster, aname, rownum as num FROM (SELECT alno, ano, atitle, poster , (SELECT aname from artist where artist.ano=album.ano) as aname FROM album WHERE genre LIKE '%'||#{genre}||'%' ORDER BY alno DESC) WHERE aname LIKE '%'||#{ss}||'%' OR atitle LIKE '%'||#{ss}||'%') WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT ano, poster, nation, type, aname, num FROM(SELECT ano, poster, nation, type, aname, rownum as num FROM(SELECT ano, poster, nation, type, aname FROM artist WHERE aname LIKE '%'||#{ss}||'%' ORDER BY ano DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/12.0) FROM music WHERE genre LIKE '%'||#{genre}||'%'
SELECT * FROM artist WHERE ano=#{ano}

SELECT mno, title, alno, ano, poster, genre, likecount, playcount, altitle, aname, rownum FROM (SELECT mno, title, alno, ano, poster, genre, likecount, playcount, (SELECT atitle FROM album WHERE album.alno=music.alno) as altitle, (SELECT aname FROM artist where artist.ano=music.ano) as aname FROM music WHERE ano=#{ano} ORDER BY playcount desc) WHERE rownum <=10
SELECT * FROM album WHERE ano=#{ano} AND rownum <= 4

SELECT mno, title, alno, ano, lylics, poster, genre, style, playtime, lylicist, composer, arranger, price, likecount, playcount, titlecheck, urlmp4, urlmp3, (SELECT atitle FROM album WHERE music.alno=album.alno) as altitle, (SELECT aname FROM artist WHERE music.ano=artist.ano) as aname FROM music WHERE mno=#{mno}
SELECT * FROM album WHERE alno=#{alno}
SELECT aname FROM artist WHERE ano=#{ano}
SELECT alno, ano, atitle, poster, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday, genre, style, likecount, (SELECT aname FROM artist WHERE artist.ano=album.ano) as aname FROM album WHERE alno=${alno}

SELECT mno, title, alno, ano, likecount, playcount, urlmp4, urlmp3, aname, num FROM (SELECT mno, title, alno, ano, likecount, playcount, urlmp4, urlmp3, aname, rownum as num FROM (SELECT mno, title, alno, ano, likecount, playcount, urlmp4, urlmp3, (SELECT aname FROM artist WHERE music.ano=artist.ano) as aname FROM music WHERE titlecheck=1 ORDER BY MNO DESC) WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{ss}||'%' OR aname LIKE '%'||#{ss}||'%') WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/20.0) FROM (SELECT titlecheck, title, (SELECT aname FROM artist WHERE artist.ano=music.ano) as aname FROM music) WHERE titlecheck=1 AND (title LIKE '%'||#{ss}||'%' OR aname LIKE '%'||#{ss}||'%')

SELECT mno, ano, alno, title, altitle, aname, poster, num FROM (SELECT mno, ano, alno, title, altitle, aname, poster, rownum as num FROM (SELECT mno, ano, alno, title, (SELECT atitle FROM album WHERE album.alno=music.alno) as altitle, (SELECT aname FROM artist where artist.ano=music.ano) as aname, poster FROM music ORDER BY mno DESC) WHERE aname LIKE '%'||#{ss}||'%' OR title LIKE '%'||#{ss}||'%') WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT alno, ano, atitle, poster, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday, aname, num FROM (SELECT alno, ano, atitle, poster, regdate, aname, rownum as num FROM (SELECT alno, ano, atitle, poster, regdate, (SELECT aname FROM artist WHERE artist.ano=album.ano) as aname FROM album ORDER BY alno DESC) WHERE aname LIKE '%'||#{ss}||'%' OR atitle LIKE '%'||#{ss}||'%') WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT ano, aname, nation, type, poster, num FROM (SELECT ano, aname, nation, type, poster, rownum as num FROM (SELECT ano, aname, nation, type, poster FROM artist WHERE aname LIKE '%'||#{ss}||'%' ORDER BY ano DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO playlist VALUES((SELECT NVL(max(plno)+1, 1) FROM playlist), #{id}, #{plname}, sysdate)
INSERT INTO playlistmusic VALUES((SELECT NVL(max(plmno)+1, 1) FROM playlistmusic), #{mno}, #{plno} , sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT plno, id, plname, to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM playListMusic WHERE playlist.plno=playlistmusic.plno) as count FROM playlist WHERE id=#{id} ORDER BY plno DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM playlistmusic WHERE plno=#{plno} AND mno=#{mno}

SELECT mno, title, alno, ano, poster, genre, altitle, urlmp3, aname, num FROM (SELECT mno, title, alno, ano, poster, genre, altitle,urlmp3, aname, rownum as num FROM (SELECT mno, title, alno, ano, poster, genre, urlmp3 ,(SELECT atitle FROM album WHERE album.alno=music.alno) as altitle,(SELECT aname FROM artist where artist.ano=music.ano) as aname, (SELECT plmno FROM playlistmusic where music.mno=playlistmusic.mno AND plno=#{plno}) as plmno FROM music WHERE mno in (SELECT mno FROM playlistmusic WHERE plno=#{plno}) order by plmno desc))

SELECT mno, title, alno, ano, poster, genre, altitle, urlmp3, aname, num FROM (SELECT mno, title, alno, ano, poster, genre, altitle,urlmp3, aname, rownum as num FROM (SELECT mno, title, alno, ano, poster, genre, urlmp3 , (SELECT atitle FROM album WHERE album.alno=music.alno) as altitle, (SELECT aname FROM artist where artist.ano=music.ano) as aname FROM music WHERE mno in (SELECT mno FROM playlistmusic WHERE plno=#{plno}) ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM))
